welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Elektrougli, Russia! Known for its charming architecture and rich history, we invite you to explore our beautiful city and immerse yourself in its unique culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A new terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Domodedovo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal Business
terminals.description: A separate terminal for business and first class passengers, with exclusive lounges and services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ostafyevo International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.
